name: CxVIDoids (Mac/PC/Linux)
description: Sit back, relax, and enjoy some therapeutic virus bustin' with this classic arcade-style shooter. Accompanied by your trusty Chief Engineer and the AI-powered GAL 9000 supercomputer, you will set off to do battle with The Virus. Protected by your Social Distancing Shields and equipped with the powerful Disinfectant Injection torpedoes, can you achieve victory? With a steady hand and nerves of steel, you might have a chance to save us all! #FightTheVirus
